title: Context-Based Intensive Short-Term English Speaking Proficiency Improvement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Communication Skills and Job-Related Fundamental Vocabulary
context.additional_context: Conducting real-time video classes using smartphones for in-service professionals. A program focusing on high job-relevance situational speaking training.

learning_goals: Learners can produce fluent English speech of three or more sentences in ten job-related scenarios (meetings, negotiations, presentations, etc.).
Learners can communicate with intelligible pronunciation (over 80% comprehensibility) during real-time Q&A with peers in a video conferencing environment.
Learners can accurately construct work-related English messages using 50 essential situational phrases.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
